title: This decade has been pretty average for investment returns – but the 2020s will be worse
text:
So how were the 2010s for you? A great decade? A bit of a struggle? Everyone will have their own answer, depending on how their own lives have played out in the last 10 years.

For investors, however, we are very close to a definitive answer. There are less than 12 weeks left before the decade closes, and unless there is either a major crash or an off-the-scale Santa rally in the last few days of the year, we can already start to work out how the stock market performed compared to most other 10-year periods.

The answer is that it has been sort of in the middle. According to calculations by Cambria Investments, the decade now closing will rank as the fifth best of the 11 that have passed since...
description: So how were the 2010s for you?
